column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I have very long hair and rarely get it cut .
#id=2
#text=Lately I noticed that my hair had split ends and needed a trim .
#id=3
#text=The local beauty college has reasonable prices and has done a good job in the past when I have needed beauty services .
#id=4
#text=I checked online to see their prices and hours of service and then made an appointment .
#id=5
#text=Upon arriving I gave my name and waited a few minutes before I was introduced to my stylist .
#id=6
#text=She asked what services I needed , and after I explained we got started .
#id=7
#text=She washed my hair and conditioned it in a sink .
#id=8
#text=She combed my hair and trimmed about 2 inches off the bottom and gave me a mirror to inspect her work .
#id=9
#text=Because this is a beauty school she had the instructor check her work and make sure I was satisfied .
#text=She dried my hair and styled it .
#text=I paid and left a satisfied customer .
